meanings.definition: A type of sailing canoe used in the Pacific Islands.
meanings.sent1: The proas glided gracefully across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen relied on proas to navigate the waters.
meanings.sent3: The proas in the race were so fast, they seemed to fly!
meanings.sent4: Her proas of determination sailed her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The colorful proas painted a beautiful picture on the sea.

meanings.sent1: Many proas were docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The proas were lined up neatly along the shore.
meanings.sent3: The proas in the fleet looked like a floating forest.
meanings.sent4: Their proas of different sizes created a unique sight.
meanings.sent5: The proas bobbed gently in the calm waters of the bay.
